author: chirino
msg: Moving the jms type interfaces to the JMS namespace, hopefully this will be come a standardized set of interfaces

author: aheritier
msg: we are moving m1 plugins sites from /maven-1.x/reference/plugins/ to /maven-1.x/plugins/

author: crossley
msg: Refer to each plugin's build.xml to increment the version numbers etc.
Keep entries in plugins.xml manually sychronised until FOR-533 is fixed.

author: rooneg
msg: Don't just hardcode 30 seconds as the poll timeout.
(dispatch): Use the worker timeout for our polls, falling back to the
old behavior of 30 seconds if there is no worker timeout set.

author: rooneg
msg: Fix up the path info in the balancer backend just like we do in the
fcgi backend.  This lets Rails apps work under a balancer setup without
(proxy_balancer_canon): Set r->path_info based on the path we got
(proxy_fcgi_canon): Remove the comment about balancer not setting
